metadata.title: CVE-2019-11068 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libxslt through 1.1.33 allows bypass of a protection mechanism becausecallers of xsltCheckRead and xsltCheckWrite permit access even uponreceiving a -1 error code. xsltCheckRead can return -1 for a crafted URLthat is not actually invalid and is subsequently loaded.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11068` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1
xsltproc - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxslt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1').
